Description: Red pottery ostracon, from the body of a vessel, traces of a grey-black deposit on the interior, exterior covered with a light-brown slip with remains of four lines of black-painted demotic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (51523) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/51523)
Wangstedt 1967 / Demotische Steuerquittungen nebst Texten andersartigen Inhalts (p. 43-44, no. 17.)
Acquisition name: Purchased through: R J Moss & Co
